name: OverGrowth (itch) (Chafmere)
description:
Entry for the GoGodotJam. OverGrowth.

Plays as a fox who needs to defeat the Corrupted roots and free the forest before the corruption takes over the forest.

This game has three levels and as time goes on the "corruption" with fill the level making harder and hard to move through out the level. Reach and defeat the FOUR corrupted roots to win and pass to the next level

I recommend playing with a controller.

Controls:

WASD or Arrows: Movement

SPACE: Jump

"." Or C : Boost

"/" or V: Attack

SHIFT: Climb

Music: Eric Skiff Resistor Anthems -"http://ericskiff.com/music"
